knimeNode.name: Remote copy
knimeNode.shortDescription: Copy files from one (remote) location to another.

fullDescription.intro: This node copies files from one location to another. The locations may be remote locations. The location have to be contained in the input table.
fullDescription.option: URI to the location of the file that should be copied.
URI to the location where the file should be copied to.

ports.inPort: Table that contains the source and target URI columns.
